M

main(String[]) - Static method in class CrossingReality.ActuatorSim
Arguments are as follows; args[0] = address of interface args[1] = actuator id args[2] = action
main(String[]) - Static method in class CrossingReality.ControlPanel
Arguments to the main method are; [0] - the port that the XML-RPC server runs on (this forms part of the WSN-to-VW interface) [1] - the port that the HTTP server runs on (this forms part of the VW-t0-ACtuator interface) For further information about the design, implementation and usage of this application, please see the accompanying report, in particular Appendix C (User Manual).
main(String[]) - Static method in class CrossingReality.SensorSim
Arguments are as follows; args[0] = address of interface args[1] = node id args[2] = sensor type args[3] = value
main(String[]) - Static method in class CrossingRealityTest.ActuatorRPCServer
Arguments to main are [0] - Port on which to run the XML-RPC server.
manualActuatorAdd() - Method in class CrossingReality.ControlPanel
Manually add an actuator (id, address & type) to the database.
manualNodeAdd() - Method in class CrossingReality.ControlPanel
Manually add a node (id & address) to the database.
manualSensorAdd() - Method in class CrossingReality.ControlPanel
Manually add a sensor (id & type) to the database.
MethodServer - Class in CrossingReality
An abstract XML-RPC server, designed to be extended by a class with methods it wishes to make available via XML-RPC.
MethodServer() - Constructor for class CrossingReality.MethodServer
 
MethodServer - Class in CrossingRealityTest
An abstract XML-RPC server, designed to be extended by a class with methods it wishes to make available via XML-RPC.
MethodServer() - Constructor for class CrossingRealityTest.MethodServer
 
mysqlAddress - Static variable in class CrossingReality.ControlPanel
 
mysqlPass - Static variable in class CrossingReality.ControlPanel
 
mysqlUser - Static variable in class CrossingReality.ControlPanel
